view.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Smart Device Management System
view.loginUserPassword: You need to provided username and password to access your system.
view.loginPasswordText: Please enter your name and password to log in.
view.forgotText: Enter your e-mail address below to reset your password.
view.learnTo: Need help? Learn more about how to
view.passwordConfirmationText: Forgot password request processed successfully .Email has been sent with OTP to reset password on xxx.gmail.com please reset password
view.accountConfirmation: You account is successfully confirmed . Please use your email address and password to login in account.
view.registered: Your account is successfully created. But you need to confirm your email address to activate account. An email is already sent to your registered email address . Please check your email and click on activation link to active account.
view.notAccountConfirmation: You account is not available or already confirmed before. Please use your email address and password to login in account.
view.passwordChanged: You account password is changed successfully . Please use your email address and password to login in account.
view.resetPassword: You have initiated reset password. Reset Password link  is send to your registered mobile. Please click on link to change your password.
view.resetDetail: Enter your password and confirm password to reset:
view.personalDetail: Enter your personal details below, Your email address will be your username:
view.social: Or sign up with a social network
view.enterYourPassword: Enter your e-mail address below to reset your password
view.resetView: Reset your password by your email address.
view.accessDenied: Access Denied. Please contact your administrator for permission.
